Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state C, $P_C=1 \times 10^5 P_a$ and $V_C=5L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A, $P_A=1 \times 10^5 P_a$ and $V_A=2L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state B, $P_B=4 \times 10^5 P_a$ and $V_B=2L$
During the cycle, the work done by the outside world on the gas is $W=-(W_{BC}-W_{CA})=-S_{\Delta ABC}=-450\mathrm{J}$
